channel.title: Add Items to Shop
channel.description:
How do I add an item to my donator shop?
I searched in my Config folder which has the Shops.CFG, but the shop I was looking for wasn't there.

item.title: Add Items to Shop
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

If the shop isn’t in shops.cfg then there is no shop yet. You have to make one. I’m assuming this is delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Items to Shop
item.dc:creator: @wrath0fgufix wrath0fgufix
item.description:
@wrath0fgufix wrote:

in shophandler.java or something open that, find your donator shop, then theres lots of numbers, find the ID of it and the amount of the item you want to add inside.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Items to Shop
item.dc:creator: @AfterLifeLochie AfterLifeLochie
item.description:
@AfterLifeLochie wrote:

[quote=“BlacknRaven, post:3, topic:332014”]lol go into client.java add the shop number and shop npcid:
Search for:
WanneShop = 5;

If You find this it should look somthing lke this:

			} else if (NPCID == 552) { //Varrock Genral Store
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 5; //Varrock Genral Store

Then when you find it add this under it:
} else if (NPCID == NPCID) { //STORE NAME
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = SHOP NUMBER; //STORE NAME

Then save.

Then Go into Autospawn.cfg add your spawn where you want your shop.

Then go to shoGo to bottom of list:

shop = 2 Aubury’s Rune Store 2 2 554 10000 555

shop = 2 The 2 is the Wannashop ID
OK Now

Replace the 554 with your ItemID then the next number 10000 is the Ammount then it repeats.

Then Yea Have Fun

Let me Know if you need anymore Help.[/quote]

How do I add an item to my donator shop?
I'm not sure if you were asking if you create a shop, which is what BlacknRaven just showed us, or if you actually wanted to add items like I quoted you saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Add Items to Shop
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

lol go into client.java add the shop number and shop npcid:
Search for:
WanneShop = 5;

If You find this it should look somthing lke this:

			} else if (NPCID == 552) { //Varrock Genral Store
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 5; //Varrock Genral Store

Then when you find it add this under it:
} else if (NPCID == NPCID) { //STORE NAME
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = SHOP NUMBER; //STORE NAME

Then save.

Then Go into Autospawn.cfg add your spawn where you want your shop.

Then go to shoGo to bottom of list:

shop = 2 Aubury’s Rune Store 2 2 554 10000 555

shop = 2 The 2 is the Wannashop ID
OK Now

Replace the 554 with your ItemID then the next number 10000 is the Ammount then it repeats.

Then Yea Have Fun

Let me Know if you need anymore Help.

Read full topic
